scripts.build: npm run clean && webpack --bail --config ../../config/webpack/webpack.config.release.js --env=package=b-service && npm run build:layer
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && webpack --bail --config ../../config/webpack/webpack.config.dev.js --env=package=b-service && npm run build:layer
scripts.deploy:local: npm run build:dev && cdk deploy --context environment=local --context developer=$(whoami)
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:dev && cdk deploy --context environment=dev
scripts.deploy:stage: npm run build && cdk deploy --context environment=stage
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --context environment=prod
scripts.test:unit: npm run clean:unit-tests && npm run build:unit-tests && npm run nyc
